title: Impact of Senator Obama's Tax Proposals as Described by Economic Advisors on Workers, Distribution of Federal Tax Change by Cash Income Percentile, 2009

meta_data.Description: 2009 distribution, by cash income percentile, of the federal tax change of Senator Obama's tax proposal on workers.  Workers are defined as tax units with positive wages and salaries or non-zero schedule C or F income.
meta_data.title: Impact of Senator Obama's Tax Proposals as Described by Economic Advisors on Workers, Distribution of Federal Tax Change by Cash Income Percentile, 2009
meta_data.Keywords: Distribution of Current Law and Recent Tax Cuts,2009
